Class Player

        public void setCards​(Card[] cards)
        Transformer function which sets the player's cards.
        Parameters:
        cards - An array containing the player's cards Precondition: cards.size == 4 && the cards array has one copy of each card Postcondition: The cards are given to the player

      • removeTile

        public void removeTile​(Tile tile)
                throws Exceptions.NoSuchTileFoundException
        Transformer function which removes the given tile from the player's tile collection.
        Parameters:
        tile - The tile to remove Precondition: A tile of the given type exists Postcondition: The tile will be removed from the collection
        Throws:
        Exceptions.NoSuchTileFoundException - When an invalid tile class is passed

        public int calculatePoints()

      • countAmphorasOfColor

        public int countAmphorasOfColor​(java.lang.String color)
        Counts how many amphoras of the given color the player has in his hand.
        Parameters:
        color - The color of the amphoras to count
        Returns:
        The count of the amphoras that match the given color Precondition: Color != null && is a valid amphora color Postcondition: The count will be returned Invariant: The count will always be >= 0.

      • countMosaicsOfColor

        public int countMosaicsOfColor​(java.lang.String color)
        Counts how many Mosaics of the given color the player has in his hand.
        Parameters:
        color - The color of the Mosaics to count
        Returns:
        The count of the Mosaics that match the given color Precondition: Color != null && is a valid mosaic color Postcondition: The count will be returned Invariant: The count will always be >= 0.

      • countSkeletonOfSizeAndPart

        public int countSkeletonOfSizeAndPart​(java.lang.String size,
                                      java.lang.String part)
        Counts how many Skeletons of the given size and part the player has in his hand.
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the skeleton to count
        part - The part of the skeleton to count
        Returns:
        The count of the skeletons that match the given attributes Precondition: size is either ["small","big"] & part is either ["top","bottom"] Postcondition: The count will be returned Invariant: The count will always be >= 0.

      • countStatueOfCategory

        public int countStatueOfCategory​(java.lang.String category)
        Counts how many Statues of the given category the player has in his hand.
        Parameters:
        category - The category of the statues to count
        Returns:
        The count of the statues that match the given category Precondition: category is either ["Sphinx","Caryatid"] Postcondition: The count will be returned Invariant: The count will always be >= 0.

      • getFinalPoints

        public int getFinalPoints()
        Accessor function which returns the final points the player has gathered
        Returns:
        The total number of points gathered

        finalPoints - The points gathered
